keywords.indexterm: Using your own Content Fusion Enterprise server

body.p: The information in this topic is meant to help system administrators install and configure your own Enterprise server solution.

section.title: Types of Server Connections
section.p:
The Oxygen Content Fusion Connector add-on requires a deployed Enterprise server, or you can evaluate the product for a limited time using the Evaluation server hosted by Oxygen:
The solution allows you to host your own server to store content that is uploaded through the connector add-on. With this model, you will be able to set up and configure your own server. This solution also allows you to upload custom frameworks so that all contributors will have access to them when reviewing content in . You also have the ability to extend the functionality through plugins and configure various options.
(https://fusion.oxygenxml.com) This solution is a service where content that is uploaded through the connector add-on is stored on an Evaluation server hosted by Oxygen. This solution allows you to try for free for 60 days but you cannot control the server configuration and your documents will be uploaded to a shared server (it is recommended that you use sample documents that do not contain sensitive information or ownership rights).

section.title: Supported Enterprise Server Deployment Solutions
section.p:
The solution supports the following type of server deployment:
Linux Platforms Using an Installation Kit The installation kit for this solution has been built to run on Ubuntu 20.04, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 7, and CentOS 7.
